message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. This is a great deal considering its value. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $10,000 is a bit too low for me, considering the value of the product. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price that considers both our interests.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still only able to offer $10,000.  This is a fair price considering that I could buy the same product from John for that amount. If you're not willing to accept that price, I'll have to go with John's offer.
